resources.string: Enables and customize recent apps display

All changes in colors and background alpha will reflect directly in QS ribbons
Landscape view doubles tiles per row quantity
Tick to show or untick to hide the clear all button within the recent applications screen
Choose in which corner the clear all recent apps button is shown
Press on color below to apply
This RAM bar shows the actual android memory (RAM) utilization. Please note that having cached apps helps your device open apps much faster.
Reset RAM bar and Slim recent panel colors to default?
Change your notification drawer background style
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app
Automatic light condition change mode is enabled. Manual switching is not possible.
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
View or change lock screen button actions
Customize lock screen sliders or shortcuts
Change appearance of lock screen or colors
Customize functions of lock screen widgets
Turn screen on and show all notifications when device is pulled out of pocket. Turn screen off when device gets back into pocket.
Always turn screen on when pulled out of pocket, even when there are no notifications pending
Hide low priority notifications such as google now weather notifications
Allow dismissing even non clearable notifications. Of course, they\'re just hidden from lockscreen and not from the notification panel.
Show notifications expanded by default. You still will be able to toggle between expanded and normal view.
Wake device when a new notification is received
Number of notifications displayed at once
Offset to the top of the screen:
Disables notifications from being shown and dismissed. This way, you just see the icons of your notifications.
Excluded applications will not show up as lockscreen notifications
Choose between manners to show pending notifications on lockscreen

Each one of notifications on lockscreen services under (PEEK or/and LOCKSCREEN NOTIFICATIONS) will auto disable the other. Make sure to check when disable one of them if you want to use one of those features again.
Show latest notification after picking up your device
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Must draw gesture to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock gesture
Wakeup device when smart cover opens
Enter with a notification and set a reminder for the same
Sets the background of the notification panel header to an image based on the current date and time
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Reset network stats color to default?
Hide when there is no traffic
Hide network stats indicator when there is no traffic
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
Change direction of the system animations
Reset all animation settings to default?
Note: Most apps need to be restarted for custom values to take effect
Select this option if you use LTE (4G).
When Wi-Fi is connected network mode is switched to 2G.
The device will switch to 2G when the screen is off.
When device is unlocked network mode switches to 3G again.

Note: This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is out. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key

Show recent apps panel on the left edge.
Time until the volume panel to hide

Work-around for inaccurate proximity sensors: this will force phone to turn on the screen after the call has ended.
Top pie does not show status and clock information
Change the button icon color mode
To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are available
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Change the shorcuts icon color mode
Change the shorcuts icon color mode
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off the navigation bar can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable pie controls instead?
No other navigation is currently enabled. Turning off pie controls can result in an unusable device. Do you want to enable navigation bar instead?
Minimum one of the main triggers (bottom, left or right) needs to be enabled.
Reduces left and right trigger size if keyboard is active
Allow legacy widgets that don\'t natively support lock screen placement

Some widgets may not behave as expected when placed on the lock screen. Other widgets may expose your personal data to anyone who accesses your device. Please be mindful of these warnings before continuing.
Successfully enabled application moving.\n\nThe device needs to be rebooted for the setting to take effect.
Successfully disabled application moving.\n\nThe device needs to be rebooted for the setting to take effect.
Only show up when StatusBar is hidden
Exclude notifications marked as low priority
Exclude notifications from the app running in foreground
Check to exclude hover notifications from insecure lockscreen
Blurs and display the content behind your lockscreen, your data may be visible to those around you
Show heads up notification always expanded
Show updates from pending background notifications as heads up
Show heads up notification at the bottom of the screen
If snooze button is pressed disable heads up for %d minutes.
Heads up notification will show up for %d seconds.
Heads up notification will show till it is dismissed.
This will hide all force close notifications

Init.d scripts have been added to this build for experimental purposes only. While some people may see improved performance on certain phones, there is always the possibility that some phones may not benefit from the scripts and you may actually see a negative impact. The ideal situation is to find the right combination of scripts that provides the best bang for your buck while keeping a certain level of stability.
Zipalign any unaligned apps on each boot
Fix permissions on apps and their data on each boot
Clear application cache files each boot
Speed up file systems at boot
It looks like init.d isn\'t setup properly. Please contact your ROM developer.

These settings are included for experimentation and any changes made to them have the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss or hardware failures.\n\nWe request you do not file bug reports if any of these settings have been changed from the defaults.
The time between wifi scans when no stored access points are available
Windows Manager\'s max events per second
This is a runtime value that controls the number of events the system will allow in a second
The amount of time from when the system registers an incoming phone call until the ringer
This controls the size of the cache the Dalvik VM has access to
We should look because knowing is half the battle
*WARNING* if you change this value it will add the needed values to your build.prop if they are not already present
When you are in-call screen is off when the device moves away from your face this delay value controls how long before screen turns on
This is astetic and doesn\'t improve the system
Modify the buffer-size for better performance
Enable hardware acceleration where the GPU controls the UI instead of the CPU
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Enable/disable speak for Read New messages
Enable/disable speak for battery fully charged
Enable/disable speak for clock after screen turn on
Enable/disable speak for date after screen turn on
Enable/disable speak for Read New messages from notifications
Which apps allowed to speak for new notifications
Limit the speak notification of each app to only play once per set time period
Gapps based off of PA full-modular Gapps, containing inverted playstore with multi-DPI fix
Fully packed with the majority of GAPPS, these are commonly used by users that do not want to download/install them later
Popular Gapps packages that contains the minimal apps required for basic use
While Xposed is proven to be a very useful tool, some modules may cause issues/bugs in custom ROMs. Please uninstall all modules before reporting any bugs that you may come across while using Xposed.
Browse and install modules to be used with Xposed Framework
Google Camera (flashable) with photosphere and HDR mode
